main event: Pilots and civilians observed a round disc or ball, described as bright and moving extremely fast over Maxwell AFB, Alabama.
interesting points: The object was seen by multiple witnesses including military pilots and civilians in the Montgomery area.,The disc was estimated to be 10 to 15 miles distant and appeared at a high altitude above 50,000 ft.,The object was described as ball-shaped and possibly metallic, with a long trailing tail.,Weather conditions were gathered, and the observation lasted for about 10 minutes.,The observers measured the object to be approximately 35 feet in diameter using a stopwatch.
sighted object: a round disc or ball-like object
witness description: 14 T-33 pilots and civilians in the Montgomery area
